question: List top 5 albums by track count
query: SELECT a.title, r.name, COUNT(t.id) AS track_count FROM albums a JOIN artists r ON a.artist_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tracks t ON t.album_id = a.id GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY track_count DESC LIMIT 5;

question: What is the total duration of all tracks?
Show artists with more than 1 album
query: SELECT r.name, COUNT(a.id) FROM artists r LEFT JOIN albums a ON a.artist_id = r.id GROUP BY r.id HAVING COUNT(a.id) > 1;

question: List all rock tracks
query: SELECT name FROM tracks WHERE genre = 'Rock';

question: Which album has the longest track?
query: SELECT a.title, MAX(t.duration) FROM albums a JOIN tracks t ON t.album_id = a.id GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY MAX(t.duration) DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Count tracks per genre
query: SELECT genre, COUNT(*) FROM tracks GROUP BY genre;

question: Average track duration by genre
query: SELECT genre, AVG(duration) FROM tracks GROUP BY genre;

question: List albums released after 2015
query: SELECT title, year FROM albums WHERE year > 2015;

question: Find albums with more than 2 tracks
query: SELECT a.title, COUNT(t.id) AS cnt FROM albums a LEFT JOIN tracks t ON t.album_id = a.id GROUP BY a.id HAVING COUNT(t.id) > 2;

question: List artists sorted by name
query: SELECT name FROM artists ORDER BY name;

question: Show albums and their artist names
query: SELECT a.title, r.name FROM albums a JOIN artists r ON a.artist_id = r.id;

question: Count total albums per artist
query: SELECT r.name, COUNT(a.id) FROM artists r LEFT JOIN albums a ON a.artist_id = r.id GROUP BY r.id;

question: What tracks are in the first album?
query: SELECT t.name FROM tracks t JOIN albums a ON t.album_id = a.id WHERE a.id = 1;

question: Longest track name
query: SELECT name FROM tracks ORDER BY LENGTH(name) DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Album release years
query: SELECT DISTINCT year FROM albums ORDER BY year;
